law.catch_line: On or before January 1 of each year, Baltimore City shall give to the Governor and to the Administra...
law.text:
On or before January 1 of each year, Baltimore City shall give to the Governor and to the Administration an accounting report that:
Shows the actual costs of the preceding fiscal year;
Shows the expenditure budget of the current fiscal year; and
As to each, accurately identifies the costs enumerated in § 8-408(a) of this subtitle.
